directions: Remove all seeds from jackfruit. Combine jackfruit and BBQ sauce in a slow cooker. Cook on High for 3 to 4 hours.
Use a fork to shred jackfruit meat. Spread margarine on hamburger buns and place a scoop of jackfruit "meat" on top. Serve immediately
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can jackfruit in brine, drained
title: BBQ Jackfruit Sandwich
